# CMakeLists.txt

message("Adding DS baselasses ${DSHOWBASECLASSES}")

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
$ENV{DSHOWBASECLASSES}
)

SET(DS_SRCS 
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/amextra.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/amfilter.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/amvideo.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/arithutil.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/combase.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/cprop.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/ctlutil.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/ddmm.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/dllentry.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/dllsetup.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/mtype.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/outputq.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/perflog.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/pstream.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/pullpin.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/refclock.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/renbase.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/schedule.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/seekpt.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/source.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/strmctl.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/sysclock.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/transfrm.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/transip.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/videoctl.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/vtrans.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/winctrl.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/winutil.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxdebug.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxlist.cpp
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxutil.cpp
)
SET(DS_HEADERS
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/amextra.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/amfilter.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/cache.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/checkbmi.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/combase.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/cprop.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/ctlutil.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/ddmm.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/dllsetup.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/dxmperf.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/fourcc.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/measure.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/msgthrd.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/mtype.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/outputq.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/perflog.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/perfstruct.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/pstream.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/pullpin.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/refclock.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/reftime.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/renbase.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/schedule.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/seekpt.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/source.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/streams.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/strmctl.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/sysclock.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/transfrm.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/transip.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/videoctl.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/vtrans.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/winctrl.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/winutil.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxdebug.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxlist.h
${DSHOWBASECLASSES}/wxutil.h
)

ADD_LIBRARY( baseclasses STATIC ${DS_SRCS} ${DS_HEADERS})
